name: The Noughties Filch
description:
This game was made by Joao Vitor Rabello de Araujo, a game programmer. Thanks to GDP-UFRJ that helped me with some questions <3 (Special Thanks to Pierluigi and Carolina Sa)

Plot:

You're a lil' old man that stole a chocolate from a convenience store and now need to run from the police using your bike on the opposite way.

Controls:

Number 4: Move left

Number 6: Move right
